extension.description: Control squeezebox players from XBMC. If you're running squeezeslave locally, essentially turns your XBMC into a SqueezePlayer! Uses pysqueezecenter as a bridge to the CLI for squeezeboxes. Uses squeezeslave for local playback if you wish.
